review: Simplicity in a stick. Plug it in and pair it with your Wi-Fi. Excellent picture and sound quality. There is so so much content to chose from and if you're a prime member most of the content is free. I and I bet you really like free. Don't hesitate, just spend the $39.99 and enjoy.
author: William F. Weidman

review: Love it!  I am a Kindle lover and have had a Prime membership for two years.  Now my family is raving about all the shows and movies they can watch for nothing.  You can get rid of your HBO and Showtime cable costs if you don't mind waiting for a season to be available with the prime membership.  You can play games too but I haven't purchased the controller - maybe at some point I will.  Another Amazon plus!
author: DJ
